note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized).
title: Share of people living with depressive disorders, males vs. females
subtitle: Estimated share of people who have  [depressive disorders](#dod:depressive_disorders), whether or not they were diagnosed, based on representative surveys, medical data and statistical modelling.
